aboutEden.title: About Eden Center and VPC
aboutEden.text: The history of Eden Center is a story of displacement and belonging. We want to preserve and build upon this history for generations to come.

donate.title: Donate
donate.text: We collect donations to cover some of the costs to operate and organize. We are entirely volunteer-based and donations go a long way to help us serve the community and contribute to the vision of a more equitable future.

events.title: Get Involved
events.text: If you'd like to get involved and personally help our anti-displacement efforts, we'd love for you to work with us!
